name: paymentAuthorizationController(_:didSelectShippingContact:handler:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationController, 
                    didSelectShippingContact contact: PKContact,
